thought: To craft andesite_stairs, I need to craft 4 andesite first. Andesite requires placing 1 diorite and 1 cobblestone side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the diorite from slot 14 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
